analysis: The current project is a test-website focused on black holes with a dark, cosmic theme. The HTML file contains the structure for the website, the CSS file is incomplete and needs to be fully developed with animations and cosmic visuals, and the JavaScript file has syntax errors and incomplete functionality. The goal is to enhance the UI with a black hole theme, including animated objects, slides, and pages.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a full dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add CSS animations for a more dynamic and engaging user experience.

Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices. Ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.

Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners and functionality for the new buttons added in test-website/index.html.
